name: Karlson Multiplayer
description:
Since Dani is gonna take a while to release Karlson, and I'm another milk drinking Karlson / Dani fan, I decided to make my own version of Karlson multiplayer that y'all can enjoy.

Karlson Multiplayer is basically a remade version of the original game karlson with of course, some multiplayer. Right now, due to lack of players (totally not because I'm broke af), this game will run on the free version of photon, which means that only  upto 20 players can play at a time, all servers inclusive.

(Yes this game might not be as good as the original trailer, so don't hate on me, I made it in literally one week for fun lol)

Update (15 July 2021)
  • Fixed a known issue where players fall out of the map.
  • Fixed a known issue where players re spawn without full ammo.
  • Fixed a known issue players can kill themselves with their own guns at high speeds.
  • Fixed a known issue where players see inaccurate hit points.
  • Fixed a known issue where players faced crashes after joining or hosting lobbies.
  • Fixed a known issue where sometimes pistols don't play animations.
  • Added small changes to map.
  • Added in-game chat system.
  • Added in-game player kill-feed, and player join and leave messages.
  • Added builds for Windows (32 bit and 64 bit), Mac and Linux 

If there's any issues, bugs or suggestions that you would like to give, please do so in the comments :)
